description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. You create your own world in CastleMiner. Play online with your Avatar and up to 15 of your friends. Build amazing worlds on an infinite spanning landscape with over 200 block types! Mine treasures deep underground in a labyrinth of caves, different every time you play. Build worlds, save them and share them online.  Castle Miner
